member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS
member.summary: TheMIB_TCPSTATS structure contains statistics for the TCP protocol running on the local computer.

summary.para: The retransmission time-out (RTO) algorithm in use. This member can be one of the following values:

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS.dwRtoMin
member.summary: The minimum RTO value in milliseconds.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS.dwRtoMax
member.summary: The maximum RTO value in milliseconds.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS.dwMaxConn
member.summary: The maximum number of connections. If this member is -1, the maximum number of connections is variable.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS.dwActiveOpens
member.summary: The number of active opens. In an active open, the client is initiating a connection with the server.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS.dwPassiveOpens
member.summary: The number of passive opens. In a passive open, the server is listening for a connection request from a client.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS.dwAttemptFails
member.summary: The number of failed connection attempts.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS.dwEstabResets
member.summary: The number of established connections that were reset.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS.dwCurrEstab
member.summary: The number of currently established connections.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS.dwInSegs
member.summary: The number of segments received.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS.dwOutSegs
member.summary: The number of segments transmitted. This number does not include retransmitted segments.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS.dwRetransSegs
member.summary: The number of segments retransmitted.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS.dwInErrs
member.summary: The number of errors received.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS.dwOutRsts
member.summary: The number of segments transmitted with the reset flag set.

member.name: MIB_TCPSTATS.dwNumConns
member.summary: The number of connections that are currently present in the system. This total number includes connections in all states except listening connections.
